title: Header
description: Represents a set of standardized attributes needed for identification and attribution.

transaction_id.description: A unique UUIDv7 assigned for this specific message.

version.description: The PIES specification version this message complies to. Value shall be a valid semantic version formatted string.

kind.description: The specific kind of PIES message data type this message represents.

system_id.description: A valid NRIDS IT Service Management code which identifies the source system, service or asset that the data originates from.

record_id.description: The record or primary key representing what the data this message is directly associated to.

record_kind.description: The kind of record the source system stores this record as (i.e. Permit, Project, Submission or Tracking).
